attributes.action: Change inheritance law where a sibling is left out
attributes.additional_details: I myself have been subject to this and many others too. I feel it is about time there was change. A fair and moral outcome of this matter would be equal and decent. No child should ever feel second best and made to feel so unworthy. Unless there is a probably cause for a child to be excluded, there should be no way a person should have to live through they were never good enough.
attributes.background: To make a fair and honest change where siblings are left an equal amount of whatever is left if any

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your situation, but we can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who people leave their estate to in their will are a matter for individuals, not the UK Government or Parliament.
